trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_SEQ_00<tab>Ser Berengeoit strikes you as a man with a sizable chip upon his shoulder, and such men are often ready to spend handsomely.

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_SEQ_01<tab>Ser Berengeoit insists that one dark night, he slew a wounded dragon with a well-aimed shot from a ballista. Alas, without a trophy, none will call him aught but a fevered fool. Someone must find the carcass and bring back a bone.

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_SEQ_02<tab>To your mild surprise, you find a dead dragon on a gorge floor as the young knight insisted, and collect from it a fine bone. This trophy will mean more to Ser Berengeoit than all the fish in the Sea of Clouds.

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_SEQ_03<tab>Ser Berengeoit receives the dragon bone with something resembling ecstasy. If even half the knights of Ishgard are as covetous of a kill, there is little to stop the war from continuing to rage...
TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the dragon bone to Berengeoit.

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_000<tab>Adventurer, how would you like to assist a dragonslayer? I put a bolt through a dragon while manning the ballistas overlooking the gorges. I saw its death throes, and then it plunged...
TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_001<tab>But nobody will believe me! I had not the time to collect a trophy before I was relieved, and they will not credit what they do not see!

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_002<tab>The carcass is out there in the bottom of a gorge, just waiting to be claimed. I hear you can find <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>, and I need a dragon bone to show the others!
TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_020<tab>Did you get my dragon bone? That was my <var 1A 02 /var>first<var 1A 01 /var> dragon, you know... It's <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var>...
TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_030<tab>Yes! Yes! Dragon bone! Who's spinning yarns now, huh? By the Fury!

TEXT_GAIUSC008_00945_BERENGEOIT_000_031<tab>Berengeoit Dragonslayer, blessed in the eyes of Halone... I have <var 1A 02 /var>dreamed<var 1A 01 /var> of this. Do you realize that I shall be commended by the archbishop himself?
